alert-plugin.name: alert-cli
alert-plugin.description: Alert sender plugin that can execute a CLI script.
alert-plugin.serverplugin:help: Used to execute a CLI script.

c:list-property.name: misconfiguredAlertDefs
c:list-property.c:description: Alert scripts run authenticated as a user specified in their definitions. If a user is deleted, the alert definition will contain invalid reference to that user and needs to be update manually. This operation returns a list of such misconfigured alert definitions.

serverplugin:control.name: reassignAlerts
serverplugin:control.description: Re-assign alerts to run as different users

c:simple-property.name: userName
c:simple-property.description: The name of the user to re-assign the alerts to.

c:simple-property.name: alertDefIds
c:simple-property.c:description: The comma-separated list of the alert definition ids to re-assign. If left empty, all the alert definitions with the CLI notifications that have an invalid user assigned, will be re-assigned to the provided user.

c:simple-property.name: packageId
c:simple-property.description: The id of the package containing the script to execute.

c:simple-property.name: repoId
c:simple-property.description: The id of the repo to download the package from.

c:simple-property.name: userId
c:simple-property.description: The user the script will be run as.
